snippet.title: Voidwrought | Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Delve into the thawing remains of the Gray City and vanquish the false gods you find there. Voidwrought is a cosmic-horror metroidvania with tight traversal, varied abilities, and formidable boss battles, coming to Steam, Epic Games Store, and Nintendo Switch on 24 October 2024.

📚KWALEE GAMES
🔥Voidwrought ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2014550/Voidwrought/
🍇GladiEATers ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2141280/GladiEATers/
👶🏻In Sink ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1858650/In_Sink/
👺Hordes of Hunger ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2157710/Hordes_of_Hunger/
⚔️The Spirit of the Samurai ► https://shorturl.at/drtIJ
🚓The Precinct ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/490110/The_Precinct
☀️Wildmender ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1599330/Wildmender
🔫ROBOBEAT ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1456760/ROBOBEAT
🔪Space Chef ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1272290/Space_Chef
🪙The Coin Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/598980/The_Coin_Game/
